mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T018WorkTotalTime( employeeNo, attendanceYearAndMonth, attendanceRegisterFlag, approvalStatus, sentReportStatus, updateTime, createTime, updateUser) SELECT #{employeeNo}, DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval 9 hour),'%Y%m'), 0, 0, 0, date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), "" FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT employeeNo FROM T018WorkTotalTime WHERE attendanceYearAndMonth=DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval 9 hour),'%Y%m') AND employeeNo = #{employeeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT attendanceYearAndMonth, CONVERT (workingTimeReport USING utf8)workingTimeReport, sumWorkTime, approvalStatus, updateUser, updateTime, approvalStatus FROM T018WorkTotalTime WHERE attendanceRegisterFlag = 0 AND employeeNo = #{employeeNo} ORDER BY attendanceYearAndMonth DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE T018WorkTotalTime SET updateTime= date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), workingTimeReport = null, sumWorkTime = null, approvalStatus = 0, sentReportStatus = 0, updateUser = "" WHERE employeeNo = #{employeeNo} and attendanceYearAndMonth = #{attendanceYearAndMonth}

UPDATE T018WorkTotalTime SET workingTimeReport= #{workingTimeReport}, updateTime= date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), updateUser = #{employeeName} WHERE employeeNo = #{employeeNo} and attendanceYearAndMonth = #{attendanceYearAndMonth}
